Все ждал сервера, а получили в итоге хиты через палеты, метания топоров через стены, деревья, хиты в 3 метрах от окна. Просто дермище а не игра. В этом дермище ещё баг с подвалом добавился. Всегда мечтал об этом.
PS. Спустя год написания комента. В игре появилось ебучие количество читаков. Ебашут через стены. Гены в 1 косание заводят и тд.

Herkese selamlar. Öncelikle oyun katil ve 4 kurban arasında geçiyor. Perk ve Add-On' sistemi var oyun bittikten sonra topladığınız Blood Pointlerle Blood Web üzerinden hangisi seçmek istiyorsanız onu alıyorsun Perkler kalıcıdır ama Add-Onlar ise maçı güvenli bir şekilde bitiremezseniz siliniyor ama siliniyor diye sonsuza kadar saklamayın :) 

Oyunun en sevdiğim kısmı maç esnasında bolca akıl oyunları, fedakarlık, bencillik, takım çalışması, olacakları öngörme... hepsinin önemini oynadıkça daha iyi anlayacaksınız

Daha bahsetmediğim bir çok konu var artık sizlere sürpriz olsun peace out...

i want to start by saying that i have way more hours on my ps4 whe it comes to dbd , and i racked some hours here.
Long term investment for me was just not worth , the higher the rank the less fun , just tryhard SWF groups that you will 100% lose if you dont play spirirt or nurse .
if you want to have fun dont aim for the highest rank , just play the game.
Still i can not recommend it , since the new UI makes vomit ( and they dont want to revert it) ,there are a lot of bugs that ruin the experience and the queue times are sometimes horrendous , as a rank 1 freddy i hand 1 hour queues , not worth guys... not worth.

I have logged more than 300 hours as killer/survivor mixed together on console, finally decided to make the transfer to steam. Overall this game is very enjoyable, it meshes gameplay and scares very well, while still being skill based and exciting. The main negative reviews on this game are based on the community, which is filled with salt and hate on both sides (killer and surv). In my opinion, this game is worth trying atleast once, it has hundreds of hours of gameplay and you can always find new content at the rate they update the game, and the updates are partially free (not really but kinda), you're able to play on the dlc maps and earn the dlc perks slowly.
Uno de los mejores juegos de terror asimetricos que existe, solo falta que arreglen los bugs

This game is super fun to play with friends. Game is rich with a lot of fresh content and rewards taking the time to learn it. Survivor is super thrilling. Killing is super nerve racking especially against pro survivors. One of the best multiplayer games out there. Best hide and seek game made till date :DDDD

外挂越来越多，没素质玩家越来越多。
内容越来越快餐，人屠比例本来就是4比1，现在幻神横行，单排玩家完全没有游戏体验，导致大部分都变成屠夫玩家，或者直接离开，人越来越少，我倒想看看把人类单排玩家全逼跑了之后这游戏还有没有人玩。
新入坑玩家选屠夫打不过不好好学就开始幻神，玩人类倒了就拔。制作方，请你清楚，人和玩家是1比4才能开1把游戏，你这样剥削人类的游戏体验到最后只会恶性循环，车队是有，但是屠夫明显都能看出来是不是车队，但是还是护士凛妹针对，高配处决把人类挂记起来打，让这种恶性循环一直持续。这游戏主要的玩家就是单排玩家，希望到了没人玩单排玩人类的那天你们还能开心的起来~

Gra koniec konców jest fajna lecz giga trudna i liptonowa pod kilkoma wzgledami.
2 lata temu czekales w kolejce 10min+ na killerze i miales fun z gry bo zabiles wszystkich            4 ocalacych, Niestety teraz nie doswiadczysz w tej grze fun'u co kiedyś. Trudno sie gra na killerze, owiele lepiej byc survivorem z perkami pod toxic build zeby jeszcze bardziej uprzykrzyc zycie killerowi - słabo. 

Koniec końców, gra chyba sie zwaliła, przynajmniej ja widze wiecej minusuów niz plusów. Rozgadałbym się tu na tyle tematów ale f@k it.
Jeżeli chcesz doświadczyc nieprzyjemnosci, sprawdzic swoja mentalnosc, wytrzymalosc nerwowa, to chetnie kupuj ta gre. 

Napewno przez pierwszy rok ci sie spodoba i bedziesz mial w planach kupic jakiegos dlc na promce. Polecam ta gre do roku+- (zalezy)

tak moze i mam jakies z 200 godzin z gry to slabo, wiec moja recenzja na tego typu temat zwiazany z gra, nie musi byc w 100% pewna. Opowiadam to co ja przez 200 godzin+- zagrałem, doswiadczylem.

PS : naprawcie tą gre, wywala czesto

500+ hours in and im happy to say im still a bot but feel the need to write a review regardless. The only form of satisfaction i get of feeling good is when i play a kill your friends with an ebony mori and camp hook. But ayways back to the main review.

Guys:
You will like this game because it offers the same satisfaction you get from having a w**k. If you're playing survivor, the first feeling you get when you load in is all mysterious, like when you first log on to watch explicit adult content, you're unsure of the categories and what the outcome is going to be. When you start getting chased by a killer you feel an adrenaline rush and get instantly "happy", and finally when you get hooked the climax comes to an end. If you're one of those weird dude who loves having their a** eaten out then getting hit through pallets or windows will give you the same satisfaction. 


Girls:
You have the ability to talk shit in chat and play like a bot and no one can call you out for it unless you stick around for after the game lobby, thats completely your choice. Mid game no 12ie can talk shit and write in chat "Lets farm this egirl for brownie points" - unless they're in your discord which you then can try to jump off hook to avoid interaction with that feral kid and delete him from your life. 


Actual review:
Overall a fun game, better played with friends. You will experience some toxicity overtime, especially if you play killer but you have your good and bad games so try to look past that. I recommend talking shit in chat, you will meet some awesome people. 
- don't hack, don't camp, don't slug cats, have fun.
cool game, really got me hooked

Ho appena fatto 4 partite da survivor e fin qui tutto bene, niente male il gameplay, ma come ben sapete si può giocare anche come killer! Veramente una delusione non ho trovato neanche una partita ho atteso 28 minuti circa, ho riavviato la ricerca e altri 25/27 minuti di nulla!, pensavo di aver acquistato un gioco per intero non a metà! Sinceramente non consiglierei mai un gioco con dei problemi così! Capisco e comprendo i bug durante le partite ma quelli che non ti permettono neanche di unirti ad una partita non sono giustificabili...
страшилка
good for growing grey hair

Un gioco impegnativo in cui ti devi affidare soprattutto al teamwork, nonostante ciò devo dire che ho trovato (come tutti i giochi) pregi e difetti: come pregi posso elencare il fatto che la meccanica è molto originale e nonostante il gameplay. Il tutto ha anche una storia misteriosa dietro come ad esempio: chi è questa entità? 
Anche se però i difetti non vengono a mancare: proprio  ieri con un mio amico avevamo scoperto un bug in cui il killer (L'infermiera) era riuscita a scavalcare un pallet. Anche se però c'è da dire che gli sviluppatori stanno facendo un grosso lavoro per fixare il tutto e proprio per questo motivo lascerei in pace per ora i bug, un altro problema SONO I RANK mi è capitato (quando avevo iniziato a giocare) a rank 20 di trovare un soppravissuto random che praticamente un tempo era molto probabilmente rank 1! quella partita grazie a lui la siamo riuscita a vincere anche se però devono modificare il fatto dei rank : per esempio se un tempo una persona era rank 1 killer o survivor e aveva abbandonato il gioco per diversi mesi , quella persona ormai rank 20 che è ritornata a giocare dovrebbe essere messa con rank più alti!
Ci sono tantissimi difetti per questo gioco ma per ora non continuo per non rendere questa recensione un papiro. Fatto sta se cercate un gioco impegnativo in cui molte delle volte dovete combattere da soli questo è per voi :D

47 вопросов из 10 "зачем же, черт возьми, нужны окна и палеты, какая-то подозрительная по цвету и составу гибкость, на которую ты потратил полжизни ожиданий и тысячу нервных ганглиев, чтобы тебя хитанули по ту сторону мира сего" 
10000 миллионов желаний из 1 удалить эту игру по причине "как же меня задолбало токсичное комьюнити и баги"
И бесконечность вопросов из отрицательной бесконечности "зачем, черт возьми, тут нужна эмблема за альтруизм" и "почему мне не дали капельку, когда всех  моих коммунистических тиммейтов закемпили?"
 А так игра очень хорошая. Если у тебя есть лишние 500 рублей, то ты можешь отдать их разработчикам на скинчики (нелишние тысячи две ты уже отдал на длс, чтобы вдохнуть запах перемен). 
 А на этом плюсы заканчиваются. Игра крутая, всем рекомендую 
 P.S. Ты не умрешь, теперь все начнут тебя покупать!

杀鸡这款游戏本身很好玩，但是这游戏被国内低素质玩家毁了。
感觉屠夫的素质普遍比人类高。
玩人类的时候，屠夫怎么样我都没什么怨言，毕竟我只是一条咸鱼。有时屠夫还会放你出去。
玩屠夫的时候，对面的人类玩家真的让人无语。
如果没有这些低素质玩家该多好。

Je recommande ce jeu :

En Survivant très cool aussi mais vaut mieux être avec des potes 
Point négatif:
manque de fair play de la communauté
